original_text: Then on the third day after I gave birth, this woman also gave birth. And we were alone. There was no one else with us in the house; only we two were in the house.
korean_text: 내가 해산한 지 사흘 만에 이 여자도 해산하고 우리가 함께 있었고 우리 둘 외에는 집에 다른 사람이 없었나이다

sentences.original_text: Then on the third day after I gave birth,
sentences.korean_translation: 그런데 내가 아기를 낳은 지 사흘 만에,

sentences.original_text: There was no one else with us in the house
sentences.korean_translation: 집에는 우리와 함께 다른 사람은 아무도 없었고,

sentences.original_text: only we two were in the house.
